Car module¶

This module contains Car Class

class car.Car(car_license)[source]¶
getColor()[source]¶

Return an RGB Color

>>> renault = Car(CarLicense("1234 WWW"))
>>> renault.setColor(Color(24,24,0))
>>> renault.getColor()
(24, 24, 0)
getEngine()[source]¶

Return 0 for ENGINE_DIESEL and 1 for ENGINE_GASOLINE

>>> renault = Car(CarLicense("1234 WWW"))
>>> renault.setEngine(Car.ENGINE_GASOLINE)
>>> renault.getEngine()
1
getLicense()[source]¶

Return an string from CarLicense object

>>> renault = Car(CarLicense("1234 WWW"))
>>> renault.getLicense().getValue()
'1234 WWW'
getModel()[source]¶

Get the model of this car

>>> renault = Car(CarLicense("1234 WWW"))
>>> renault.setModel("Renault Grand Modus")
>>> renault.getModel()
'Renault Grand Modus'
setColor(color)[source]¶

Change car color

Parameters:color (Color) – RGB Color 
>>> renault = Car(CarLicense("1234 WWW"))
>>> renault.setColor(Color(24,24,0))
>>> renault.getColor()
(24, 24, 0)
setEngine(engine)[source]¶

Set engine type. Use ENGINE_DIESEL and ENGINE_GASOLINE constants.

Parameters:engine (int) – Car.ENGINE_DIESEL or Car.ENGINE_GASOLINE 
>>> renault = Car(CarLicense("1234 WWW"))
>>> renault.setEngine(Car.ENGINE_DIESEL)
>>> renault.getEngine()
0
setLicense(license)[source]¶

Set license using CarLicense class

Parameters:license (CarLicense) – Set license 
>>> renault = Car(CarLicense("1234 WWW"))
>>> renault.setLicense(CarLicense("2222 BCD"))
>>> renault.getLicense().getValue()
'2222 BCD'
setModel(model)[source]¶

Set the model of this car

Parameters:model (str) – Car model 
>>> renault = Car(CarLicense("1234 WWW"))
>>> renault.setModel("Renault Grand Modus")
>>> renault.getModel()
'Renault Grand Modus'
